text: hey sorry been away the last wee while doing talks. the tree is looking really nice but again as before without any wireframe i cant give you a proper review , there would be no point showing stuff like that to an employer without the wireframe , Just keep it short and sweet for the cv, you have 10 seconds to capture us before we click off. so hobbies , background stories stuff like that should be avoided. just keep it simple, what youy want, what you have done and what you are going to do , then a list of qualifications, then all the extra stuff so that its optional . your portfolio is 70-90% the most important
